about_the_game:
Welcome to Kidduca 3D – an interactive educational game where children will study Spanish, English, Portuguese, and French, practice essential skills in math, writing, and reading, improve their color recognition, solve exciting logic puzzles, and enjoy thrilling racing games! Kidduca 3D is designed for young learners to explore a variety of engaging and fun activities!

Key Educational Features:

3D LEARNING GAMES FOR KIDS

Kidduca 3D offers over 90 educational levels, filled with 400+ interactive elements such as letters, numbers, shapes, words, animals, and vehicles. Children enhance their language skills, practice counting, learn to read, and tackle engaging puzzles. This interactive learning experience is ideal for both boys and girls aged 2 to 9!

NUMBER & MATH EDUCATION GAMES

Help your child learn numbers through fun and engaging math activities. These educational math games build a strong foundation in counting and introduce basic arithmetic concepts in an easy-to-understand format.

SHAPES, COLORS & CREATIVE COLORING ACTIVITIES

Through interactive drawing and coloring games, your child will learn to identify shapes and colors, enhancing their logical thinking, fine motor skills, and creativity. These activities are perfect for children aged 2 to 5, supporting early cognitive development.

ALPHABET & WORD LEARNING GAMES

Children aged 2 to 9 can explore letters, words, and sounds with our interactive alphabet games and flashcards. These activities boost language proficiency in English, Spanish, Portuguese, and French, enhancing your child’s early literacy and writing skills.

LOGIC PUZZLES & SORTING EDUCATIONAL GAMES

Develop your child’s critical thinking skills with educational sorting games and logic puzzles. Kids will sort objects by size, color, and shape, fostering strong problem-solving abilities and cognitive growth.

EDUCATIONAL CAR RACING GAMES

Encourage learning through play with customizable car racing games. Children can create their own cars and tracks, developing skills such as spatial awareness, hand-eye coordination, and strategic thinking.

WHY CHOOSE KIDDUCA 3D?

Kidduca 3D provides a safe, educational, and enriching environment where children engage in interactive learning while having fun. Each level is narrated by native speakers, assisting your child in learning correct pronunciation in Spanish, English, Portuguese, and French. This game seamlessly integrates entertainment and education, making it ideal for toddlers, preschoolers, and early learners!

DOWNLOAD KIDDUCA 3D TODAY

Download Kidduca 3D, the perfect choice for parents seeking safe educational games for toddlers and preschoolers. Our educational content covers everything: learning Spanish, English, Portuguese, and French, practicing math, improving writing, enhancing reading comprehension, exploring colors, solving puzzles, and enjoying thrilling car racing!

Kidduca 3D is where learning and fun come together in a world of exciting educational adventures!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E6750 or equivalent / AMD Athlon 64 X2 Dual Core 5000+ or equivalent
  • Memory: 4000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 capable graphics card
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E6750 or equivalent / AMD Athlon 64 X2 Dual Core 5000+ or equivalent
  • Memory: 4000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 capable graphics card
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space

publishers: RMB Games - Free learning games fo Kids
short_description: Amazing! The best educational game for kids to help them learn Letters, Numbers, Colors, Shapes in English, Spanish, Portuguese and French!
supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Spain*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Russian*, French*, Italian, German, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Indonesian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil*, Romanian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese
*languages with full audio support
